oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Economics and Animal Welfare Considerations of Early Castration and Utilization of RalgroÂ® Implants
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bonner, John M.
Cain, Michael F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: RALGRO implants
weaning weight
castration
economics
animal welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Increasing calf weaning weight is the goal of every cowcalf producer because of its direct relationship to herd profitability. Currently, many production technologies and management strategies exist that can be used to increase weaning weights. One of the best and most economical methods is implanting suckling calves with RALGRO.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1984; 27-32
